itemDescription: heir apparent to the Earldom of Harewood (born 1980)

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Edgar Lascelles, Viscount Lascelles (born 13 May 1980) is an English chef, and the third child and second son of David Lascelles, 8th Earl of Harewood, and his first wife Margaret, Viscountess Lascelles. He is a great-great-grandson of King George V and is 65th in line to the British throne. He is heir apparent to the earldom of Harewood, due to his elder brother having been born before their parents' marriage.
